name: Caren West PR

description:
Caren West PR is an award-winning, full-service PR and graphic design firm that has an affinity for clients that are as entrenched in and obsessed with pop culture as we are. From music and fashion to food and events, we work with forward-thinking companies, artists, events, and brands.Â 
We believe in the power of being connected, and providing our clients with innovative and strategic PR and design solutions that are backed by research, expertise and our passion for delivering meaningful results.
